name: Multiviewselect
tagline: You can select one views among all shown views.
body:
### Select one view among indexed images
If user select one view, top left label shows number of index.

### All views are positioned in 3D style.

Simple introducing about this 
http://swamful.blogspot.kr/2014/11/multi-view-select.html


Moving of view need more detailed adjustment.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
